item.title: Omics Playground: Derive biological insights from your omics data at your fingertip
item.description: Disclaimer: This post is sponsored by BigOmics platform. I have personally tested the platform. The opinions and views expressed in this post are solely those of the author and do not represent the views of my employer. A brief description of the platform. What challenges could the platform solve? The BigOmics platform - Omics Playground- provides a simplified approach for the effective processing of bulk RNA-seq data and proteomics data, resolving many issues experienced by scientists in the field.
